p: GC-MS analysis of the C. sativa EO, obtained from the Futura 75 genotype by steam distillation, identified 35 compounds, which accounted for 95% of the whole GC profile (Table 3). Most were sesquiterpenes found at very low concentrations, except for β-caryophyllene (15.31%) and α-humulene (3.68%). Myrcene (17.17%), α-pinene (19.20%), and β-pinene (4.34%) were the main monoterpenes.
